question: You are going to another country to study. you would like to do a part-time job while you are studying , so you want to ask a friend who lives there for some help. write a letter to this friend.give details of your study plansexplain why you want to get a part time jobsuggest how your friend could help you to find a job
text: Hope you are doing well.It is my pleasure to  inform you that I got admission for Masters in Artificial Intelligence at the University of Toronto.

As you know, studying abroad is my keen interest since my childhood.The classes will commence in September and there will be 12 hours of lectures in a week.Apart from the classes,I am allowed to work for 20 hours a week.I am actively looking for a part-time job to meet my monthly expenditures.I possess exposure to antenna design as well as  signal processing.Since you are working in  customer support ,I expect your help in finding a job in that field.Additionally,my language skills are excellent and hence I can be a part of the support team until I get a job that matches my requirements.Furthermore,it will be well appreciated if you arrange  an interview so that I can prove my abilities.
I am looking forward to hearing a positive reply from you.Hope we can meet in a month.
